level.heading: Aiding or assisting unauthorized activity.
level.text: No person shall aid or assist another person in unauthorized activity proscribed by ยง 31-231, including selling, soliciting, or negotiating for applications, policies, memberships, or other business.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 16-232
level.text: For Law 16-232, see notes following ยง 31-231.
